text: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 2 (marketed as The Texas Chainsaw Massacre Part 2) is a 1986 American horror comedy movie directed by Tobe Hooper. It is a sequel to The Texas Chain Saw Massacre. It was written by L. M. Kit Carson and produced by Carson, Yoram Globus, Menahem Golan and Hooper. It stars Dennis Hopper, Caroline Williams, Bill Johnson, Bill Moseley and Jim Siedow. It is the only movie where Leatherface dies. ==References== Category:1986 horror movies Category:1986 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:The Texas Chainsaw Massacre movies Category:Movies set in Texas
title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 2
